0110001111001011 0110101011001100 1 -> sum: 1100111010011000, cout: 0
0010001101010010 0011011110010101 1 -> sum: 0101101011101000, cout: 0
0101101011001100 0001100000100111 0 -> sum: 0111001011110011, cout: 0
1111111000110101 1110001010101001 0 -> sum: 1110000011011110, cout: 1
0100101010011000 1010011111110110 1 -> sum: 1111001010001111, cout: 0
1111110100000101 0000111010010100 0 -> sum: 0000101110011001, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
